# Government Tender Announcement

## Mandatory Requirement

### Title
English: Engine Condition Trend Monitoring (ECTM), Challenger series

### Reference
Reference number: cb-7361-26051890
Amendment number: 1
Solicitation number: T8493-23-xxxx/A
Publication date: 2023-07-19
Tender closing date: 2023-08-28T14:00:00 (expired)

## Bidding Details
Notice type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
Procurement method: Competitive - Traditional
Selection criteria: Lowest Price
The bidder must demonstrate compliance with the following sections of the bid solicitation:

- Capacity to carry out engine trend analysis on General Electric CF-34-3B model engines
- Proof of current Bombardier Challenger CL 600-2B16 [CL-604 and CL-650] operators under contract with the bidder

## Contract Details
Contracting entity: Transport Canada
Contracting entity address: 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, ON K1V 9B2, Canada
Expected contract start date: 2024-01-01
Expected contract end date: 24 months inclusive

Bidders must ensure they meet the minimum requirements outlined in the solicitation documents and submit a responsive bid that includes substantial information describing how they meet the requirement.
